ygData.subject: RE: The dark boned bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: greater dark bones in unrest spawn in the basement and in the tower s top floor. if you re only a small group you can just camp the bottom of the stairs of the
ygData.messageBody:
greater dark bones in unrest spawn in the basement and in the tower's top
floor.

if you're only a small group you can just camp the bottom of the stairs of
the basement, i pulled the first one of the night from there but only got a
bronze bracer 8)


So i ran around from basement to tower and the group in the basement let my
buddy loot a skull he needed and the group in the tower let me loot a bracer
(Thanks Halana!)

Minkin Nehoc
Sol Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kyle Sibbald [SMTP:ksibbald@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 7:17 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] The Real Scoop on Genni
>
> From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>
> I can possibly see how they could miss this. Who would think to sell
> these
> things back to a vendor when they are mainly to be used to get quest
> items.
> Especially on the test server where there are probably not enough people
> to
> find this out (or the people who found this out waited till the patch came
> down to make mega cash like the pie tin sketch incident). They also almost
> slipped up on the Shin Gauntlets. Trying to sell them to a vendor will get
> you a price of 432 plat but the vendors won't buy them...
> Incidentally, anyone know where Greater Dark Bone Skeletons spawn?
> I'd
> *really* like a pair of the bracers and I've never heard of these things
> before.
>
> Good Journey,
>
> Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
>

> 8)before they
> 8)implemented the quests. I fail to see how lack of paying attention to

> 8)Galtin of E'ci

> 8)disappeared was that

> 8)then turn
> 8)> around and sell them to a
> 8)> vendor for a profit! So GMs shut them down.
